name: Nordicom
tag_list: emergency-response-system, wireless-panic-button, duress-alarm, duress-system, correctional-security, lone-worker, prison-security-system, man-down-alarm
description: Man down alarm & prison security system
overview:
Who is Nordicom?

Nordicom is composed of a team of dynamic professionals who combine more than ten years of expertise in the field of wireless communication from design to manufacturing.

MAIN LINE OF BUSINESS Nordicom specializes in the design and the manufacturing of electronic systems (inferfaces) that are generally combined with radio waves. These devices act as “virtual bridges” between either electronic or electric equipment and MAN, linking various systems (alarm, fire, call buttons, etc.) to radio communication systems such as pagers or cell phones. These “interfaces” have a series of parameters that can be modified, resulting in a flexible and variable configuration in order to suit the client’s needs.

DISTRIBUTION NETWORK

Nordicom works closely with its experienced distributors who also specialize in the field of communication. This network of distributors spreads from Quebec, Ontario, the Maritimes, the Western Canada to USA market. With the help of these distributors, Nordicom has also sold equipment to certain countries in the Orient.

NORDICOM’S TASK

To offer wireless solutions to the growing demands of instant communication between equipment and people on the move
